metadata.title: CVE-2024-53051 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/i915/hdcp: Add encoder check in intel_hdcp_get_capabilitySometimes during hotplug scenario or suspend/resume scenario encoder isnot always initialized when intel_hdcp_get_capability adda check to avoid kernel null pointer dereference.
